about_the_game:
Venture into the vastness of space as a daring explorer in Expedition Astra, an enthralling VR adventure set in the orbit of Neptune and the mysterious expanse of the Kuiper Belt. As a researcher tasked with a critical mission, your role is to navigate through uncharted territories, collecting precious asteroid samples amidst the celestial wonders of our solar system.

Key Features:

  • Explore the Unknown: Navigate the vastness of the Kuiper Belt, a region filled with icy bodies and remnants from the solar system's formation. Each mission takes you to unexplored worlds, unveiling mysteries that have lingered in the darkness for eons.
  • Sample Retrieval: Embark on critical missions to retrieve samples from research vessels deployed in the vast expanse of space. Each retrieval demands skillful navigation and precise control.
  • Problem-Solving in Zero Gravity: Suit up for spacewalks and engage in hands-on problem-solving to detach and recover the stranded vessels.
  • Direct Asteroid Sampling: Experience Bennu-like missions where you're tasked with collecting samples directly from the surface of asteroids. Maneuver your spacecraft to touch down on these celestial bodies, navigating their challenging terrains.
  • Strategic Deployment: Take on the strategist role by deploying special ships equipped with explosives. Carefully plan these missions to gather rocks and debris from asteroids, contributing to significant scientific research and resource gathering.
  • Encounter Rogue AI: Be on your guard for rogue AI ships, remnants of unknown missions with unfathomable intentions.
  • Neptune Space Station: The Neptune Space Station serves as your base. Here, you'll plan missions, analyze data, and resupply. The station is a hub of activity, receiving periodic cargo ships with essential supplies from Earth.



Navigate daring missions, from intricate sample retrieval to direct asteroid sampling, and experience the thrill of space exploration like never before. Join the journey to the edge of space – your extraordinary adventure awaits in Expedition Astra.

A Note from the Developer:

As an indie developer, Expedition Astra is more than just a game to me – it's a passion project born from a dream of bringing the wonders of space exploration to life in virtual reality. Every aspect of this game, from the spacecraft's intricate design to the Kuiper Belt's vastness, has been meticulously crafted with care and attention to detail. Join me on this journey to experience a universe where every moment is an adventure, rich in depth and realism.
